content.title: Import a Sample App
content.body:
1. From the main menu, click Project > New Project.
    The What do you want to start with now? window appears.
  2. Select Sample Apps and click Next.
  3. From the Sample Apps window, select News and Weather and click Choose.
    The application opens in the Storyboard view.
  4. Double-click on any form to view the forms in the Design view.
